I get this stacktrace when i do an update:

!MESSAGE An internal error occurred during: "CVS Update".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.team.ui.operations.ResourceMappingOperation.getMerger(ResourceMappingOperation.java:158)

in build:  I20051122-1300
The cause of this should be fixed in I20051123-1200. I'll leave this bug open as a reminder to protect against this in the ResourceMappingMergeOperation.
